snippet: The Obama administration is asking the Supreme Court to settle the legal fight over a law that denies federal benefits to married gay couples.
abstract: Justice Department is asking the Supreme Court to hear an appeal of lower court rulings striking down a part of the Defense of Marriage Act.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration is asking the Supreme Court to settle the legal fight over a law that denies federal benefits to married gay couples.

headline.main: Supreme Court Asked to Rule on Marriage Act
headline.print_headline: Supreme Court Asked To Rule On Marriage Act

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
